title: "Now Is The Time" To End Gaza War, Says US
content: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday "now is the time" to end the conflict in Gaza, and urged Israel to avoid further escalation with Iran.
summary: US Secretary of State Antony Blinken said on Wednesday "now is the time" to end the conflict in Gaza, and urged Israel to avoid further escalation with Iran.

title: Sikh Woman Employee Found Dead Inside Walk-In Oven In Canada Walmart
content: A 19-year-old Sikh woman was found dead inside a walk-in oven of the Walmart store's bakery department in Canada's Halifax city, according to media reports.
summary: A 19-year-old Sikh woman was found dead inside a walk-in oven of the Walmart store's bakery department in Canada's Halifax city, according to media reports.

title: Opinion: With CIA And Mossad, West Shouldn't Lecture Others On Espionage
content: From the CIA's colossal resources and Mossad's precision strikes to MI6s legacy of colonial espionage and RAW's rising influence, these agencies navigate the murky waters of international politics anddiplomacy.
summary: From the CIA's colossal resources and Mossad's precision strikes to MI6s legacy of colonial espionage and RAW's rising influence, these agencies navigate the murky waters of international politics anddiplomacy.

title: American Billionaire's Cliffside Mansion Is Up For Sale For  $108 Million
content: Darwin Deason's estate spans nearly 13,000 square feet and features stone columns, balconies and a private elevated beach.Â
summary: Darwin Deason's estate spans nearly 13,000 square feet and features stone columns, balconies and a private elevated beach.

title: Donald Trump's Ex Lawyer Asked To Hand Over Valuables, Manhattan Apartment
content: A judge instructed Rudy Giuliani, Donald Trump's former personal lawyer, to turn over valuables and his luxury Manhattan apartment on Tuesday to two election workers he was found to have defamed.
summary: A judge instructed Rudy Giuliani, Donald Trump's former personal lawyer, to turn over valuables and his luxury Manhattan apartment on Tuesday to two election workers he was found to have defamed.

title: Opinion: LAC Pact: Will China's Words Match Its Actions?
content: For Indians at large, the question still remains whether China indeed wants to move towards a lasting solution to the boundary dispute, or whether this is another tactical attempt at buying time as both China and India continue their ascent.
summary: For Indians at large, the question still remains whether China indeed wants to move towards a lasting solution to the boundary dispute, or whether this is another tactical attempt at buying time as both China and India continue their ascent.

title: NATO, Ukraine, Trade: Europe's Jitters Ahead Of US Elections 2024
content: Donald Trump has threatened to upend NATO, cut a quick deal with Russia over Ukraine and impose trade tariffs if he wins November's presidential election.
summary: Donald Trump has threatened to upend NATO, cut a quick deal with Russia over Ukraine and impose trade tariffs if he wins November's presidential election.

title: 300-Million-Year-Old Fossils Reveal What World's Biggest Arthropod Looked Like
content: The giant arthropod 'Arthropleura', which roamed the Earth over 300 million years ago, combined traits of millipedes and centipedes, new fossils have revealed.
summary: The giant arthropod 'Arthropleura', which roamed the Earth over 300 million years ago, combined traits of millipedes and centipedes, new fossils have revealed.

title: "Major, Unjust Threat": 11,000 Artists On "Unlicensed Use" Of AI
content: Thousands of artists have signed a statement warning about the unlicensed use of artificial intelligence. The statement was organized by British composer and former AI executive Ed Newton-Rex.
summary: Thousands of artists have signed a statement warning about the unlicensed use of artificial intelligence. The statement was organized by British composer and former AI executive Ed Newton-Rex.

title: Despite Donald Trump's "Hate" For Taylor Swift, Ivanka Attends Her Concert
content: Ivanka Trump took her 13-year-old daughter, Arabella, along with her friends to the Taylor Swift concert in Miami, despite her father, Donald Trump, once publicly declaring he hated the 14-time Grammy Award-winner.
summary: Ivanka Trump took her 13-year-old daughter, Arabella, along with her friends to the Taylor Swift concert in Miami, despite her father, Donald Trump, once publicly declaring he hated the 14-time Grammy Award-winner.

title: How Injecting Diamond Dust Into Atmosphere May Cool Down The Planet

title: US "Absolutely" Ready For First Woman President: Kamala Harris
content: Kamala Harris said Tuesday that America is "absolutely" ready to elect its first woman president but downplayed her historic bid, saying she simply wants to turn the page for a nation "exhausted" by Donald Trump.
summary: Kamala Harris said Tuesday that America is "absolutely" ready to elect its first woman president but downplayed her historic bid, saying she simply wants to turn the page for a nation "exhausted" by Donald Trump.

title: Al Jassasiya: Qatar's Largest Rock Art Site Which Has 900 Ancient Carvings
content: The carvings, mostly enigmatic cup marks arranged in various patterns, also feature sailing ships, symbols and signs.
summary: The carvings, mostly enigmatic cup marks arranged in various patterns, also feature sailing ships, symbols and signs.

title: Prime Minister Modi To Meet China's Xi In Russia
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping will hold their first bilateral meeting in five years Wednesday, Indian officials said, days after their countries reached a deal on their contested border.
summary: Prime Minister Narendra Modi and Chinese President Xi Jinping will hold their first bilateral meeting in five years Wednesday, Indian officials said, days after their countries reached a deal on their contested border.

title: Donald Trump Enters World's 500 Richest List For First Time In 11 Weeks
content: Donald Trump has rejoined the Bloomberg Billionaires Index for the first time since Aug. 6 as his media startup's stock surges alongside his odds in political betting markets.
summary: Donald Trump has rejoined the Bloomberg Billionaires Index for the first time since Aug. 6 as his media startup's stock surges alongside his odds in political betting markets.

title: Ex Abercrombie CEO, Partner Accused Of Sex-Trafficking Involving Make Models
content: Former Abercrombie & Fitch Chief Executive Officer Mike Jeffries was charged by the US with running a sex-trafficking ring that coerced young men to engage in sexual acts with him in hopes of a career in modeling.
summary: Former Abercrombie & Fitch Chief Executive Officer Mike Jeffries was charged by the US with running a sex-trafficking ring that coerced young men to engage in sexual acts with him in hopes of a career in modeling.

title: Rise Of Marriage Apps In Pak, Claiming To Be 'Halal', With Chaperone Options
content: Marriage apps describe themselves as "halal", or permissible in Islam, offering options to blur profile pictures for privacy and making clear the purpose is to reach a proposal.
summary: Marriage apps describe themselves as "halal", or permissible in Islam, offering options to blur profile pictures for privacy and making clear the purpose is to reach a proposal.

title: Is Scurvy Making A Comeback? What Is It? All You Need To Know
content: Scurvy is a disease caused by a severe deficiency of vitamin C (ascorbic acid), which is essential for the production of collagen. This protein helps maintain the health of skin, blood vessels, bones and connective tissue.
summary: Scurvy is a disease caused by a severe deficiency of vitamin C (ascorbic acid), which is essential for the production of collagen. This protein helps maintain the health of skin, blood vessels, bones and connective tissue.

title: Another Satellite Breakup Adds To More Than 4,300 Tonnes Of Space Junk
content: The European Space Agency estimates there are more than 40,000 pieces larger than 10cm in orbit, and more than 130,000,000 smaller than 1cm.
summary: The European Space Agency estimates there are more than 40,000 pieces larger than 10cm in orbit, and more than 130,000,000 smaller than 1cm.

title: What's Is E. Coli Outbreak That's Being Linked To McDonald's Burgers
content: A person died and 49 others fell ill following an E. coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburgers, according to a report from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
summary: A person died and 49 others fell ill following an E. coli outbreak linked to McDonald's Quarter Pounder hamburgers, according to a report from the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC).
